text.section: A benefit performance shall be personally managed and conducted only by members of the qualified organization that sponsors the benefit performance.

section.section:
At a benefit performance, a qualified organization may:
conduct games of skill; or
dispose of merchandise and other things of value by auction, voting, or using a mechanical device such as a paddle wheel, wheel of fortune, bingo, or similar device.
The activities allowed under this subsection may be conducted with or without an entrance or participation fee.
